thread.title: Bus drivers transporting eBay workers will get pay raise
thread.title_full: Bus drivers transporting eBay workers will get pay raise - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Bus drivers transporting eBay workers will get pay raise
text:
Photo: Santiago Mejia / The Chronicle Compass Transportation employees handshake each other after voting, Friday, Feb. 27, 2015, South San Francisco, Calif. After Facebook organizers first began organizing last fall, the efforts quickly spread to other tech companies. Compass Transportation who shuttle Apple, Yahoo, eBay, Zynga and Genentech voted today on whether to join the union. Compass Transportation employees handshake each other after voting,...
Bus drivers who transport eBay employees are getting a huge wage increase as part of the company’s deal with vendor Compass Transportation. Compass Transportation employees handshake each other after voting, Friday, Feb. 27, 2015, South San Francisco, Calif. After Facebook organizers first began organizing last fall, the efforts quickly spread to other tech companies. Compass Transportation who shuttle Apple, Yahoo, eBay, Zynga and Genentech voted today on whether to join the union. Compass Transportation employees handshake each other after voting,...
Bus drivers who transport eBay employees are getting a huge wage increase as part of the company’s deal with vendor Compass Transportation.
